00067 void ChromosomeT< bool >::initialize( )
00068 {
00069     for( unsigned i = size( ); i--; )
00070         ( *this )[ i ] = bool( Rng::coinToss( 0.5 ) );
00071 }

00073 void ChromosomeT< bool >::initialize( const unsigned pos )
00074 {
00075     for ( unsigned i = pos; i < size( ); ++i )
00076         ( *this )[ i ] = bool( Rng::coinToss( 0.5 ) );

00082 inline unsigned long pow2( unsigned n )
00083 {
00084     return 1UL << n;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void ChromosomeT< bool >::encode( double v,
00088                           const Interval& range,
00089                           unsigned nbits,
00090                           bool useGray )
00091 {
00092     unsigned long l;
00093 
00094     l = ( unsigned long )( ( pow2( nbits ) - 1 )
00095                          * ( v - range.lowerBound() )
00096                           / range.width() );
00097 
00098     if( useGray ) l ^= l >> 1;
00099 
00100     resize( nbits );
00101     for( unsigned i = 0; i < nbits; i++, l >>= 1 )
00102         ( *this )[ i ] = l & 1;
00103 }
00104 
00105 //===========================================================================
00106 
00107 double ChromosomeT< bool >::decode( const Interval& range, bool useGray ) const
00108 {
00109     unsigned long l, m;
00110     unsigned      i;
00111 
00112     if( useGray )
00113         for( l = m = 0, i = size( ); i--; )
00114             l = ( l << 1 ) | ( m ^= ( ( *this )[ i ] ? 1 : 0 ) );
00115     else
00116         for( l = 0, i = size( ); i--; )
00117             l = ( l << 1 ) | ( ( *this )[ i ] ? 1 : 0 );
00118 
00119     return l * range.width() / ( pow2( size( ) ) - 1 )
00120          + range.lowerBound();
00121 }

00123 //===========================================================================
00124 
00125 void ChromosomeT< bool >::encodeBinary( const std::vector< double >& src,
00126                                         const Interval&         range,
00127                                         unsigned                nbits,
00128                                         bool                    useGray )
00129 {
00130     double stepSize = ( pow2( nbits ) - 1 ) / range.width();
00131     unsigned i, j, k;
00132     unsigned long l;
00133 
00134     resize( src.size( ) * nbits );
00135 
00136     for( j = k = 0; j < src.size( ); j++ ) {
00137         l = ( unsigned long )( ( src[ j ] - range.lowerBound() ) * stepSize );
00138 
00139         if( useGray ) l ^= l >> 1;
00140 
00141         for( i = nbits; i--; l >>= 1 )
00142             ( *this )[ k++ ] = l & 1;
00143     }
00144 }

00160 //===========================================================================
00161 //
00162 //
00163 //
00164 void ChromosomeT< bool >::flip( double p )
00165 {
00166     for( unsigned i = size( ); i--; )
00167         if( Rng::coinToss( p ) )
00168             //( *this )[ i ] ^= true;
00169             //
00170             // vector< bool > is now represented by a packed bit array
00171             //
00172             ( *this )[ i ] = ( *this )[ i ] ^ true;
00173 }
00174

00176 //===========================================================================
00177 //
00178 //
00179 //
00180 void ChromosomeT< bool >::flip( const std::vector< double >& p, bool cycle )
00181 {
00182     RANGE_CHECK( p.size( ) <= size( ) )
00183 
00184     for( unsigned i = cycle ? size( ) : p.size( ); i--; )
00185         if( Rng::coinToss( p[ i % p.size( ) ] ) )
00186             //( *this )[ i ] ^= true;
00187             //
00188             // vector< bool > is now represented by a packed bit array
00189             //
00190             ( *this )[ i ] = ( *this )[ i ] ^ true;
00191 }

00205 bool ChromosomeT< bool >::operator == ( const Chromosome& c ) const
00206 {
00207     //
00208     // this annoying static cast is necessary to satisfy
00209     // the pedantic VC++ 5.0
00210     //
00211     return static_cast< const std::vector< bool >& >( *this ) == dynamic_cast< const std::vector< bool >& >( c );
00212 }

00220     return false;
